metadata.title: CVE-2021-47239 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: usb: fix possible use-after-free in smsc75xx_bindThe commit 46a8b29c6306 ("net: usb: fix memory leak in smsc75xx_bind")fails to clean up the work scheduled in smsc75xx_reset->smsc75xx_set_multicast, which leads to use-after-free if the work isscheduled to start after the deallocation. In addition, this patchalso removes a dangling pointer - dev->data[0].This patch calls cancel_work_sync to cancel the scheduled work and setthe dangling pointer to NULL.
